评论概述: Didn’t fit the first and second time we bought them
评论详情: We bought them the first time way too big, we bought them the second time still didn’t fit and they are itchy when you walk in them.

评论概述: True to size and great quality
评论详情: Nice jeans and look great. They fit true to size and my daughter loves this "y2k" style. They wash well with no issues and the applique are really nice with no curling.
Really nice. Laundry well with no fading or shrinkage. Length 31. Comfortably material.

The jeans fit true to size and my daughter says that they are very comfortable on. She likes the star detail and they seem to be pretty well-made; however, the shape doesn't quite match the pictures on the ad. My daughter is 5'7'', so I can see why they may be a bit shorter, but overall, they do not seem to be as baggy or flared as we had hoped.
